name: Car Traffic Controller
description:
My very first game released for Miz Jam 1 in 21 hours. Inspired by Air Traffic Controller (ATC).

Choose from four different difficulties. Play until you crashed three cars or missed three goals on a single wave. After every wave, the carspeed and spawnintervall is 10% faster.

Potential future Updates:

-More levels
-Different Cars
-Rogue-like elements (Get Powerups)
-New mechanics: trains, foot traffic, more controlls etc.

Have fun playing and post your Highscore!
